column3: Latest;Kampot: The body of the man was found floating at the bottom of the Rainbow Bridge (Old Bridge) in Kampot City at 6:15 am
column5: 2020.------The unidentified corpse was not found to have died of suspicious circumstances.------Authorities summoned an ambulance from the provincial hospital to take the deceased for cremation at Wat Sovann Sakor pagoda.------The man was described as ‘black’ with a beard wearing a towel/krama. ------AREY
